CDG.ActionRiskyThingDesc: Whenever an Agent does something that risks their life or their emotional stability.
CDG.ActionDarkDieDesc: When an Agent willingly exposes themselves to supernatural forces, disturbing imagery, or moral quandaries.
CDG.ActionFailureDesc: Describe a worse outcome for another Agent's action. If the result is higher than their highest die, their action fails in the way described.
CDG.ActionSelfCareDesc: When an Agent engages in a stress relieving activity, roll and reduce Stress by the result.
CDG.FailureRollContent: If your roll is higher than the other Agent's highest die, they fail, just as you described. If not, they succeed as before.
CDG.SelfCareRollContent: You engaged in Self Care. Your {stress1} was {previousstress}, your {stress2} has been reduced to {newstress}.
CDG.DialogHumanDie: TBD - If the task is within human capabilities.
CDG.DialogOccupDie: TBD - If it’s within your occupational expertise.
CDG.DialogRiskDie: TBD - If you will risk your mind to succeed.
CDG.RiskMoveMessage: TBD - The situation reveals some horror behind the universe, make an {darkdieroll}
CDG.MaxDieMessage123: You get the bare minimum: if something needs to happen to proceed with the scenario, you get it, but that’s all you get.
CDG.MaxDieMessage5: You succeed well and may get something extra.
CDG.MaxDieMessage6: You succeed brilliantly, get something extra, but maybe more than you wanted (and probably make an {darkdieroll}).
